name: Hanabi
description:
Burn the rope and set off fireworks!

This is a line puzzle game where you burn ropes to ignite firework balls!
You ignite many firework balls and set off beautiful fireworks!
Beautiful emotive experience with sounds and images!
Deep thinking and speed to beat your high score!

Connect the ropes!

To light a firework ball, you must connect ropes.
Connect the vertical, horizontal, curved, and crisscross ropes well,
Let's set off the fireworks!
